statements: SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients WHERE diagnosis IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC, appointment_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name ASC, patient_id DESC;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender, patient_address FROM patients WHERE patient_age >= 18 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM patients WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND appointment_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE patient_age BETWEEN 30 AND 50 ORDER BY diagnosis DESC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, prescription FROM patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' AND prescription IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_id;
SELECT * FROM doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE hospital_id = '12345';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, doctor_id FROM patients WHERE address LIKE '%Main Street%';
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT d.doctor_id, d.doctor_name, d.specialization, p.patient_id, p.patient_name, p.age FROM doctors d JOIN patients p ON d.doctor_id = p.doctor_id
SELECT * FROM doctors ORDER BY doctor_name ASC
SELECT patient_name, age, address FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT d.doctor_name, p.patient_name FROM doctors d INNER JOIN patients p ON d.doctor_id = p.doctor_id WHERE d.specialization = 'Cardiology'
SELECT count(*) as total_patients, AVG(age) as average_age FROM patients
SELECT * FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT doctor_id, name, specialization FROM Doctors WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date, diagnosis FROM Consultations WHERE prescription IS NOT NULL;
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS doctor_name, c.consultation_date FROM Patients p JOIN Consultations c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id JOIN Doctors d ON c.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM Doctors WHERE specialization = 'Cardiology';
SELECT name, consultation_date, diagnosis FROM Consultations WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT p.name AS patient_name, d.name AS doctor_name, c.diagnosis FROM Patients p INNER JOIN Consultations c ON p.patient_id = c.patient_id INNER JOIN Doctors d ON c.doctor_id = d.doctor_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone FROM patients;
SELECT appointment_date, appointment_time, doctor_name FROM appointments;
SELECT doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors;
SELECT consultation_id, consultation_date, consultation_details FROM consultations;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_name, patient_phone FROM patients WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM doctors WHERE doctor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY appointment_time DESC

SELECT patient_name, doctor_name, consultation_details FROM patients JOIN consultations ON patients.patient_id = consultations.patient_id JOIN appointments ON consultations.appointment_id = appointments.appointment_id
SELECT * FROM doctor
SELECT last_name, first_name, specialty FROM doctor
SELECT patient_id, first_name, gender FROM patient WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT * FROM appointment ORDER BY appointment_date DESC
SELECT prescription_id, medication_name, dosage FROM prescription
SELECT * FROM doctor;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM patient ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, last_name, specialty FROM doctor WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT * FROM prescription WHERE dosage LIKE '%mg%' ORDER BY prescription_id DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, doctor_id, patient_id, appointment_date FROM appointment WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
